channel.title: New and Extraordinary Server: Judgment Realm
channel.description:
IP: 108.163.243.58:25601
Type: [PVP] [Survival] [1.3.1] [iConomy] [NEW] [Factions] [ChestShop]
Desc: Judgment Realm is a very new Minecraft server. The spawn area is Minas Tirith, which is a giant castle from Lord of the Rings. The castle contains hundreds of shops, fun buildings, and plenty of hidden secrets. Outside the colossal metropolis is a survival and PVP wilderness. It's every miner for themselves. Form a faction, team up with your friends, conquer your foes, build your base, and claim the wild. This is truly a unique Minecraft experience. The adventures are limitless.
LINKS: Like us on facebook at facebook.com/judgmentrealm
Vote for us on minestatus.net by searching for "judgment realm". Voting takes 5 seconds, and you will be awarded 1000.00 in iConomy cash.
Check us out, and if you like us, refer a friend.
